description: This file defines and exports multiple React functional components used as shared UI elements in a personal finance tracker application, such as Card, Stat, Table, Input, Button, and others. It also imports a theme and CSS styles.

methods.name: Card
methods.description: A card component that displays a header with optional title and subtitle, a loading indicator, and a body containing children elements.

methods.name: Stat
methods.description: A statistical display component showing a label, value, trend, and type indicator.

methods.name: Table
methods.description: A table component that renders headers and rows based on provided columns and data, with loading and empty state handling.

methods.name: Input
methods.description: A generic input component with label, value, onChange handler, placeholder, and type.

methods.name: NumberInput
methods.description: A specialized input component for numeric input, utilizing the generic Input component.

methods.name: DateInput
methods.description: A date picker input component with label, value, and onChange handler.

methods.name: Select
methods.description: A dropdown select component with label, value, options, and placeholder.

methods.name: Button
methods.description: A button component with customizable class, loading state, size, and other props.

methods.name: Tag
methods.description: A tag element with a type and children.

methods.name: Legend
methods.description: A legend component displaying items with labels and colors.

methods.name: Notice
methods.description: A notice component for displaying informational or alert messages.

methods.name: Switch
methods.description: A toggle switch button with checked state and onChange handler.

methods.name: Confirm
methods.description: A modal confirmation dialog with open state, title, message, and cancel/confirm handlers.
